characters.description: Appears in Hurricane Fluttershy, crashing out of the tornado when the first attempt fails.

characters.name: Sunny Delivery
characters.description: Appears in The Break Up Break Down as a mailpony at the Ponyville post office. Her cutie mark is a shining sun with a spiral in the center.

characters.name: Sunny Rays
characters.description: Sunny Rays is a background Pegasus pony mare with a bright yellow coat, pink mane and tail with a lavender pink streak, pink eyes, and a cutie mark of three suns. She is unnamed in the show, but she is named in merchandise.

characters.name: Sunstone
characters.description: Briefly appears in Hearth's Warming Eve carrying a wooden sun when Cherry Fizzy shoos Derpy away from the curtain. Her cutie mark is four green gemstones.

characters.name: Sweet Buzz
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild, Friendship University, Common Ground, Between Dark and Dawn, The Last Problem, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Her cutie mark is three bumblebees.

characters.name:
Cheerful Fan
Sweet Pepper
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention cosplaying as Daring Do. She is a character called "Cheerful Fan" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Wavy-Haired Pegasus
The Tenth Doctor / Doctor Whooves #3
characters.description: Appears in Sonic Rainboom, Hurricane Fluttershy, Games Ponies Play, Rainbow Falls, Pinkie Pride, Trade Ya!, Make New Friends but Keep Discord, Slice of Life, Scare Master, The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1, No Second Prances, Spice Up Your Life, The Cart Before the Ponies, Parental Glideance, It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, Yakity-Sax, Between Dark and Dawn, and the WeLoveFine art print "Everypony". A wingless version appears in Magical Mystery Cure. Shares his design with Starry Eyes, Compass Star, "Sightseer", and—except mustache—S06E08 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1 and has a similar color scheme to S07E16 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2. His cutie mark is an hourglass. He is a character called "Wavy-Haired Pegasus" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "He needs to use gel to get a good coif -- with a great mane like that, though, we're not ones to scoff."

characters.name: Tiger Lily
characters.description: Seen at the Grand Galloping Gala during The Best Night Ever. Shares her design with Parasol, "Drizzle", and Prim Posy.

characters.name:
Photographer Pony
Tracy Flash
characters.description: Several paparazzi ponies appear in various episodes in the series, including Earth ponies Long Shot and Snappy Scoop, unicorn Press Release, and Pegasi Big Shot, Eff Stop, and Tracy Flash. They are unnamed in the show, "Tracy Flash" being a placeholder name, but some are named varyingly in merchandise and other depictions.

characters.name: Tropical Storm
characters.description: Appears with her eyes closed at the end of the song Winter Wrap Up in the episode Winter Wrap Up wearing a weather team vest for Winter Wrap Up. Has the same design and cutie mark as Sunshower Raindrops and the same design as Derpy, "Blue October / Blueberry Muffin", Blue Buck, High Spirits, "Fuchsia Gems", S04E24 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2, and "Bluebell". Her cutie mark is three blue raindrops. A mini-figure toy and a collector card of her are packaged together as part of the ninth wave of mystery packs. According to the card, she "loves to play outside, rain or shine!" Her name comes both from the card and from the packaging of the wave, which each list the name as a trademark.

characters.name: Trusty Splendor
characters.description: Appears within the School of Friendship during two School Raze - Part 1 scenes, reading a book in the library at daytime and parting ways with Sandbar at nighttime. Also appears on My Little Pony: Feats of Friendship Issue #1 page 16. Based on Thomas "The Illustrious Q"'s one of two HASCON 2017 "be animated for upcoming My Little Pony content" winning raffle entries, the other being Natalya's Rainbow Harmony. Identified and unofficially drawn by Mary Bellamy; (semi)identified and unofficially drawn by Trish Forstner; mentioned on Equestria Daily; hinted at on Twitter; see also Italic Quip. His cutie mark is an open book.

characters.name: Turquoise Thunder
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Rainbow Falls, at the Crystal Empire in Equestria Games, and in Tanks for the Memories. Shares her design and cutie mark design with White Lightning, "Blueberry Cloud", and S01E04 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2, shares her design and sometimes cutie mark design with Jetstream, and shares her design with Sprinkle Medley and "Pink Cloud". Her cutie mark is a cloud with a lightning bolt.

characters.name: Tut Junah
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place.

characters.name:
Vapor's Mom
Twirly Whirly
characters.description: Appears in Top Bolt as Vapor Trail's mother. Her cutie mark is a propeller. Voiced by Kelly Sheridan.

characters.name:
Snooty Fashion Scenester
Valley Trend
characters.description: Appears in Fake It 'Til You Make It as a customer at Rarity For You. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Enterplay collectible card game Friends Forever #56 U names her and quotes, "Keeping up with what's popular and stuff is, like, hard." She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves a boss during the "Fake It 'Til You Make It" event. Her bio states, "She wants an outfit that's red-carpet ready. Which red carpet? Oh, it's a TOTALLY underground red carpet: you DEFINITELY wouldn't have heard of it." Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: Velvet Light
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith, in bandages during Flim Flam Miracle Curative Tonic as well as later in the episode, in Equestria Games, in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, and in The Washouts. Shares her design and cutie mark with Merry May, Sunny Rays, and "Skyra", shares her design with Cloud Kicker, "Sky Sweeper", and "Spring Skies", and shares her mane style with Lily Valley and "Bon Voyage". Her cutie mark appears to be three suns.

characters.name: Whirlwind Romance
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Her cutie mark is a tornado and several red hearts.

characters.name: Wind Chill
characters.description: Part of Rainbow Dash's team in Winter Wrap Up.

characters.name: Wing Wishes
characters.description: Seen in Sonic Rainboom. Her cutie mark is three twisters.

characters.name:
Furniture Salespony
Wooden Legs
characters.description: Appears in The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows as a furniture store owner. Resembles Crafty Crate. Voiced by Brian Drummond.

characters.name: Pegasus Crystal Pony royal guards
characters.description: royal guards, some also referred to as the E.U.P. (Earth, Unicorn, Pegasus) Guard of the Protective Pony Platoons, are various groups of armored ponies, griffons, Hippogriffs, or gargoyles that serve various members of royalty. They act as bodyguards, ceremonial guards in festivities, soldiers, and chauffeurs on several occasions. The guards are generally shown wearing extremely serious expressions and usually don't speak, but when they do, their voice is provided by Jayson Thiessen, Andrew Francis, Peter New, Ian Hanlin, Brian Drummond, Jason Simpson and/or Scott Underwood. Their cutie marks are obscured by their uniforms.

characters.name: Berryshine
characters.description: Berryshine, or Berry Punch, is a female Earth pony with a web color plum coat, raspberry pink mane and tail, fandango eyes, and a cutie mark of a bunch of grapes and a strawberry. Lauren Faust privately named the character "Pinot Noir" after her favorite wine, but the character was later explicitly named "Berryshine" and "Berry Punch" in different merchandise and games. Berryshine shares her design with Cherry Berry. She has a speaking role in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, the chapter book Rainbow Dash and the Daring Do Double Dare, and in the IDW comics' My Little Pony: Friends Forever Issue #23.

characters.name: Blueberry Frosting
characters.description: See Blueberry Frosting.

characters.name: Caramel
characters.description: Caramel is a background male Earth pony in My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. He has a light brown coat with a darker brown mane. He shares his mane and tail style and his color scheme with Doctor Horse, and shares his design with Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. He is called Chance-A-Lot in some merchandise.

characters.name: Cherry Berry
characters.description: Cherry Berry is a female Earth pony with a hot pink coat, Naples yellow mane and tail, purple eyes, and a cutie mark of a pair of cherries. She is unnamed on the show, only being referred to as "Girl Pony" in the credits of the episode Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2, but she is named in merchandise and other media. She shares her design with Berryshine. She has speaking roles in Luna Eclipsed, The Mysterious Mare Do Well, The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000, Putting Your Hoof Down, and Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2. Her design is similar to the G1 pony Crunch Berry, named Cherry Berry in the United Kingdom.

characters.name: Chip Mint
characters.description: See "Chip Mint".

characters.name: Dr. Hooves
characters.description: Dr. Hooves, or Whooves, also known as Dr. Whooves or Time Turner, is a background male Earth pony with an hourglass cutie mark. He shares his design with Meadow Song and Lucky Clover. Hasbro acknowledged the character's popularity in the Comic Con 2011 promotional poster, where he is explicitly posed in a way that his cutie mark is clearly visible.

characters.name: Emerald Green
characters.description: Emerald Green is a background pony with an orange coat, white mane and tail, blue eyes, and a cutie mark of four green gemstones. He is an Earth pony both in few in-show appearances and in all merchandise and other media, while he is a Pegasus in most in-show appearances. He is not named in the show, but he is named in merchandise and other media.

characters.name: Felix
characters.description: Felix, or Lucky Streak, is a male background Earth pony with a bluish gray coat, dark gray mane and tail, gold eyes, and a cutie mark of three four-leaf clovers. He is unnamed in the show, but he is named "Felix" with a trademark symbol and "Lucky Streak" in merchandise.

characters.name: Globe Trotter
characters.description: Globe Trotter is a male background Earth pony with a brown coat, two-tone brown mane and tail, blue eyes, and a cutie mark sometimes of a green leaf and sometimes of a palm tree on an island. He is unnamed in the show, but he is named in merchandise.

characters.name: Golden Harvest
characters.description: Golden Harvest, or Carrot Top, is a female Earth pony with a pale goldenrod coat, carrot orange mane and tail, dark olive green eyes, and a cutie mark of three carrots with greens. Her name is not mentioned on the show, but it appears varyingly in merchandise and other media. She has speaking roles in Boast Busters, Swarm of the Century, Green Isn't Your Color, A Friend in Deed, and It Isn't the Mane Thing About You.

characters.name: Hermes
characters.description: See Hermes.

characters.name: Luckette
characters.description: Luckette is a female Earth pony with a light purple coat, pale yellow mane and tail, gold eyes, and a cutie mark of two interlocking horseshoes. She is unnamed in the show, but she is named in merchandise. She has speaking roles in the season five episode Made in Manehattan and the season eight episode Fake It 'Til You Make It.

characters.name: Lucky Clover
characters.description: Lucky Clover, or Shamrock, is a male background Earth pony with a light gray coat, dark gray mane, and light blue eyes. His cutie mark, three four-leaf clovers, resembles that of a female G1 pony named Clover. He first appears in Winter Wrap Up, and has speaking roles in The Best Night Ever and A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1. The show does not name him, but he receives his name from merchandise, other media, and promotional material. Lucky Clover also shares his design with Dr. Hooves and Meadow Song, and shares his mane and tail style with Crescent Moon and Buddy.

characters.name: Lyra Heartstrings
characters.description: Lyra Heartstrings, occasionally called simply either Lyra or Heartstrings, is a female unicorn pony who frequently appears as a background character and occasionally in more prominent roles. She has a magic mint coat, brilliant cyan mane and tail with a white streak, sunglow eyes, and a cutie mark of a lyre. The word "heartstrings" refers to deep feelings of love or compassion and is commonly used in the phrase "tug at the heartstrings" which means to cause strong feelings of affection or sympathy.

characters.name: Mare Do Well
characters.description: Mare Do Well, also called the Mysterious Mare Do Well, is a superhero alter ego created by Twilight Sparkle, Applejack, Fluttershy, Rarity, and Pinkie Pie. She first appears in the season two episode The Mysterious Mare Do Well, and she is alluded to in other media and merchandise.

characters.name: Meadow Song
characters.description: Meadow Song is a male Earth pony who appears in several episodes throughout the series. He has a moderate brown coat, amber mane and apple green eyes. The show does not name him, only referring to him as "Working Pony" and "Pony MC" in the credits of the episodes Too Many Pinkie Pies and The Maud Couple respectively, but he receives his name from merchandise. He shares his design with Dr. Hooves and Lucky Clover, and shares his mane and tail style with Mane Moon and Buddy.

characters.name: Noteworthy
characters.description: Noteworthy is an Earth background pony with a light blue coat, a darker blue mane, amber eyes, and a cutie mark of two pairs of sometimes-backwards-facing quavers (eighth notes). His name is not mentioned in the show, but he is named in merchandise and other media. He shares his design with Goldengrape and Crusoe Palm.

characters.name: Offbeat
characters.description: See Offbeat.

characters.name: Peachy Sweet
characters.description: Peachy Sweet is a female Earth pony in the Apple family. She has a yellow-green coat, light red mane and tail, bright lime green eyes, and a cutie mark of a pie. She is unnamed in the show, but she is named in another depiction and with a trademark symbol in merchandise.

characters.name: Perfect Pace
characters.description: Perfect Pace is a male background Earth pony with a blue coat, bright orange mane and tail, golden brown eyes, and a cutie mark of an hourglass. He is unnamed in the show, but he is named in merchandise and other media.

characters.name: Pinkie Pie
characters.description: Pinkie Pie, full name Pinkamena Diane Pie, is a female Earth pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is an energetic and sociable baker at Sugarcube Corner, where she lives on the second floor with her toothless pet alligator Gummy, and she represents the element of laughter. Pinkie writes and performs many songs, and she is the source of many of the show's comical and cartoonish gags. She is called Ponka Po in some merchandise.

characters.name: Pound Cake
characters.description: Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake are Mr. and Mrs. Cake's fraternal twin foals who make their debut in the season two episode Baby Cakes. They are sometimes collectively referred to as the Cake twins.[note 1]

characters.name: Rivet
characters.description: Rivet is the placeholder name of a male pony who appears usually as an Earth pony and occasionally as a Pegasus. He has a light brown coat, brown mane and tail, and blue eyes. His cutie mark is a hammer and two nails in most appearances, is a shield in two appearances, and is three raindrops in one appearance. He has a speaking role in the episodes The Mysterious Mare Do Well, Equestria Games, and Made in Manehattan.

characters.name: Scootaloo
characters.description: Scootaloo is a female school-age Pegasus pony. She first appears in Friendship is Magic, part 1, and she is later properly introduced in Call of the Cutie. Scootaloo and her friends, Apple Bloom and Sweetie Belle form the Cutie Mark Crusaders, a club/"secret society" devoted to helping ponies earn their cutie marks. She is a talented scooter driver. She idolizes Rainbow Dash and develops a sisterly bond with her in Sleepless in Ponyville. Lauren Faust has stated that Scootaloo and Rainbow are not related.[6]

characters.name: Sea Swirl
characters.description: Sea Swirl is a female unicorn pony with a lilac coat, iris mane and tail with a light glaucous streak, raspberry rose eyes, and a cutie mark of two encircling dolphins; one light glaucous and one iris. Her name has not been used on the show, but she is named in merchandise and other media. She shares her design with Minuette and Peachy Pitt. Sea Swirl mouths the word "muffins" along with other ponies in Applebuck Season and has speaking roles in The Cutie Pox and Buckball Season.

characters.name: Shoeshine
characters.description: Shoeshine is a female Earth pony with a light blue coat, periwinkle mane, fandango eyes, and a cutie mark of two interlocking horseshoes; one gold and one silver. She does not have a name given in the show, but she is named in merchandise. She is identical to Lilac Links apart from her coat color, shares her design with Sweetie Drops, has a similar color scheme to Screwy, S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3, and "Bloo". Shoeshine makes her first spoken appearance in the season one episode The Ticket Master.

characters.name: Strawberry Ice
characters.description: Strawberry Ice is a female Earth pony with a light blue coat, two-tone pink mane and tail, light pink eyes, and a cutie mark of two yellow bows. She is unnamed in the show, but she is named in merchandise. She has speaking roles in Made in Manehattan and Fake It 'Til You Make It.

characters.name: Strawberry Scoop
characters.description: See "Strawberry Scoop".

characters.name:
Daring Do Collector
Teddie Safari
characters.description: Teddie Safari is the placeholder name of a female pony who first appears in Trade Ya! She has a very light yellow coat, brilliant gamboge and light amber mane and tail, moderate harlequin eyes, and a cutie mark of three teddy bears. She is unnamed in the show, only being referred to as "Daring Do Collector" in the credits of Trade Ya! and in The Journal of the Two Sisters, and as "Receptionist Pony" in the credits of The Point of No Return.

characters.name: Twilight Sky
characters.description: Twilight Sky is a male background pony with a medium gray coat, light blue mane and tail, blue eyes, and a cutie mark of three white stars. He is an Earth pony both in few in-show appearances and in all merchandise, while he is a Pegasus in most in-show appearances. He is unnamed in the show, but he is named in merchandise.

characters.name: Twilight Sparkle
characters.description: Twilight Sparkle is the central main character of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is a female unicorn pony who transforms into an Alicorn and becomes a princess in Magical Mystery Cure. She is also the daughter of Twilight Velvet and Night Light, the younger sister of Shining Armor, sister-in-law to Princess Cadance, and paternal aunt to Flurry Heart.

characters.name: Twinkleshine
characters.description: Twinkleshine is a female unicorn pony with an ivory coat, curly pink mane and tail, electric blue eyes, and a cutie mark of three sparkly blue stars. She shares her design with Lemon Hearts, and shares her tail style with Daisy and Golden Harvest. She has speaking roles in Friendship is Magic, part 1, A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1, A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2, Amending Fences, and the IDW comics' story The Fall of Sunset Shimmer. Her design resembles that of G1 Moondancer, whose G4 counterpart Moon Dancer she mentions in her first speaking role.

characters.name: Wisp
characters.description: Wisp is the placeholder name of a male Earth pony with a light yellow coat, light blue mane and tail, blue eyes, and sometimes a cutie mark usually of two bunches of green grapes. In Rarity Takes Manehattan, he appears as a Pegasus pony.

characters.name: S06E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: See S06E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6
characters.description: See S06E13 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6.

characters.name: S01E04 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Seen in the crowd at Applejack's prize pony ceremony in Applebuck Season.

characters.name: S01E04 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Seen in Ponyville Urgent Care during a pan shot in Applebuck Season. Seen again in Leap of Faith. Shares her design and cutie mark design with White Lightning, "Turquoise Thunder", and "Blueberry Cloud", shares her design and sometimes cutie mark design with Jetstream, and shares her design with Sprinkle Medley and "Pink Cloud". Her cutie mark was a cloud with a lightning bolt.

characters.name: S01E11 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #5
characters.description: Part of Rainbow Dash's team in Winter Wrap Up. Shares her color scheme apart from her eyes with Sassaflash.

characters.name: S01E11 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #7
characters.description: Appears with slightly varying hair colors in Winter Wrap Up, Rainbow Falls, Filli Vanilli, Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, and Tanks for the Memories. Shares her design, cutie mark design, and sometimes mane and tail colors with Rainbowshine, and shares her design with Orange Swirl. Her cutie mark is a rainbow.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: A pony seen in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, as both a Pegasus and an Earth pony, during At the Gala in The Best Night Ever, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: A pony seen in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success and during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed.

characters.name: S01E16 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Cloudsdale in Sonic Rainboom and in My Little Pony The Movie. Has the same mane style and eye color as Apple Honey and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #20, and the same mane style as Gala Appleby, S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #21, and S04E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #18. Her cutie mark is a white star. She is​[​specify​]​ in Budge Studios' mobile game Harmony Quest.

characters.name: S01E16 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: A pony seen running in the weather factory in Sonic Rainboom, panicking over the misplaced snowflakes.

characters.name: S01E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears at one of the runways watching Fluttershy in Green Isn't Your Color. Shares her design with Derpy and Sunshower Raindrops.

characters.name: S01E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears at one of the runways watching Fluttershy in Green Isn't Your Color.

characters.name: S01E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears at one of the runways watching Fluttershy in Green Isn't Your Color.

characters.name: S02E11 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears during the pageant performance in Hearth's Warming Eve, at the summit of the tribes. She resembles Cloud Kicker except for mane style and eye color.

characters.name: S02E18 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Briefly appears during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, with her eyes closed and with only the front portion of her body seen on screen. Later appears in Magical Mystery Cure, with her eyes open and with her whole body seen on screen. Also appears during the Cheese Confesses flashback in Pinkie Pride, with her face not seen on screen but with the rest of her body seen on screen. Shares her design with Sassaflash, Parasol, Prim Posy, "Drizzle", Honey Rays, "Graceful Falls", "Cinnamon Swirl", "Downdraft", "Blue Diamond", "Sandstorm", and "Blue Emerald". Her cutie mark is a crescent moon.

characters.name: S02E22 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #8
characters.description: Appears wearing goggles in Hurricane Fluttershy and Rainbow Falls. Shares her color scheme with Mane Moon. Her cutie mark is a purple, orange, and yellow-striped rainbow, which Mane Moon has also had instead of his usual cutie mark in the former of the two episodes.

characters.name: S03E07 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in a Wonderbolts poster picture in Wonderbolts Academy, Castle Sweet Castle, Newbie Dash, and The Wonderbolts Academy Handbook. Either she with the design and eye color of "Blue October / Blueberry Muffin" or "Bluebell" with red mane and tail and blue eyes appears in The Washouts. Resembles Magnet Bolt in color scheme.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Shares her design with Sassaflash, Parasol, "Drizzle", Prim Posy, and others.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan. Shares her design with "Northern Lights", and shares her mane and tail style with Cherry Berry, Berryshine, and Berry Dreams. Resembles Lily Blossom.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan, Made in Manehattan, and The Gift of the Maud Pie. His cutie mark is an airstream cutting through two clouds.

characters.name: S04E10 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Rainbow Falls together with Pegasus Lucky Clover. Shares her design with Sprinkle Medley and White Lightning, and resembles "Cinnamon Swirl".

characters.name: S04E10 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Rainbow Falls. Shares her design and mane colors with Merry May and Sunny Rays, and shares her design with Cloud Kicker. Her cutie mark is three droplets of water and a swirl of air.

characters.name: S04E10 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Rainbow Falls. Shares his mane style and coat and eye colors with Uncle Orange, and shares his mane style with S04E20 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 from an angle. His cutie mark is a white crescent.

characters.name: S04E10 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Rainbow Falls helping on the Cloudsdale team. His cutie mark is not seen.

characters.name: S04E13 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Simple Ways. Shares her design with Parasol and Sassaflash, and shares her mane and tail style with "Chilly Puddle" and "Purple Haze".

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith and The Perfect Pear. Shares her design and cutie mark with Sassaflash and Honey Rays, shares her design with Parasol, and has a similar color scheme to Daisy and S02E02 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in three pictures in Leap of Faith. Shares her mane style and eye color with Shoeshine, Lilac Links, and Sunny Smiles, shares her mane style with Sweetie Drops, Luckette, and Grape Delight, and has a similar color scheme to Rainbowshine, S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5, "Swirly Cotton", "Rainbow Drop", "Northern Lights", "Amethyst Beat", Sweetsong, Star Dasher, and Bright Bridle. Her cutie mark is a heart with a banner in front of it.

characters.name: S04E21 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears with a speaking role portraying Admiral Fairweather in Testing Testing 1, 2, 3. Voiced by Jim Miller.

characters.name: S04E21 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears with a speaking role portraying General Flash in Testing Testing 1, 2, 3.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, within multiple audience crowds throughout. Earlier appears on the IDW comics' Micro-Series Issue #2 page 1. Shares her design and cutie mark with Derpy and "Blue October / Blueberry Muffin", shares her design with Sunshower Raindrops, Blue Buck, High Spirits, "Fuchsia Gems", Tropical Storm, and "Bluebell", and resembles Cloud Kicker. Her cutie mark is bubbles.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, wearing a beret and handling a spotlight. Shares her design with Rainbowshine and Orange Swirl, and resembles Sassaflash. Her cutie mark is a clapperboard.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears, at least sometimes cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1, The Cutie Map - Part 2, and a European magazine comic whose French title is Une leçon d'amitié.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #4
characters.description: Appears, sometimes cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1, The Cutie Map - Part 2, To Where and Back Again - Part 1, and Enterplay collectible card game Equestrian Odysseys expansion set card #179 C. Shares her mane and tail style with Apple Leaves.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #5
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #6
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1.

characters.name:
Eager Townspony
S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears, sometimes cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1, The Cutie Map - Part 2, To Where and Back Again - Part 1 and its recap at the beginning of To Where and Back Again - Part 2, and Enterplay collectible card game Equestrian Odysseys expansion set card #179 C. Shares his design with Starburst, Warm Front, "Cloud Break", "Serenity", "High Note", "Dewdrop", "Redwood Oak", "Sunlight", and "Silverwing" and his mane and tail style with Caramel. His cutie mark is a pan flute and musical notes. He is a character called "Eager Townspony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1. Shares his color scheme with cutie unmarked "Amethyst Skim".

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1 and Rock Solid Friendship.

characters.name: S05E05 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Tanks for the Memories. He shares his design, eye color, and rarely cutie mark with Mane Moon and his color scheme with Leadwing. His cutie mark is a rainbow.

characters.name: S05E21 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Scare Master dressed as a griffon for Nightmare Night. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 6.

characters.name:
Glitter Pony
S05E21 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Scare Master dressed as Jem for Nightmare Night. She is a character called "Glitter Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "Finally fulfilling her dream of taking center stage." Shares her color scheme with Twinkleshine.

characters.name: S05E24 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as an attendee of the Helping Hooves Music Festival. Shares her design with White Lightning and Sprinkle Medley.

characters.name: S06E07 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Newbie Dash as a Wonderbolts spectator, in Parental Glideance, and in The Washouts. Shares her design, eye color, and cutie mark with Rainbowshine and "Candy Floss" and her coat and mane colors with "Noi".

characters.name: S06E07 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Newbie Dash and Parental Glideance as a Wonderbolts spectator. Strongly resembles "Candy Floss".

characters.name: S06E07 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Newbie Dash as a Wonderbolts spectator, in Parental Glideance, in The Washouts, and in 2, 4, 6, Greaaat. Shares his color scheme and cutie mark with Caramel. His cutie mark appears to be horseshoes.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail during Hearth's Warming Eve Is Here Once Again. Her cutie mark appears to be a pair of bells.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". Her cutie mark is a yellow bow.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". Shares his design—except mustache—with Starry Eyes, Compass Star, "The Tenth Doctor / Doctor Whooves #3", and "Sightseer" and his mustache style with S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction managing a booth at the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Viva Las Pegasus, Once Upon a Zeppelin, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Her cutie mark is a red ribbon.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction managing a booth at the Daring Do Convention while cosplaying as Daring Do. Also appears in Daring Doubt. Voiced by Brian Drummond in Daring Doubt.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin and My Little Pony Best Gift Ever. His cutie mark is a torn book page.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention. Shares his design with S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #4 and S08E21 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction managing a booth at the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin. Shares his design with S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #3 and S08E21 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever.

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin, Grannies Gone Wild, The Point of No Return, Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8, and My Little Pony: Ponyville Mysteries Issue #5 page 12.

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin, Grannies Gone Wild, Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8, and My Little Pony: Ponyville Mysteries Issue #5 page 7. Shares his body design with Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. Not based on Jim Miller.

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild, Friendship University, Between Dark and Dawn, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. His cutie mark is a basketball and shooting star.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a janitor at the Ponyville Hospital. Appears in A Flurry of Emotions as a unicorn.

characters.name: S07E14 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Fame and Misfortune as the owner of a bookstore in Cloudsdale. Her cutie mark is a quill pen.

characters.name:
Royal Legionnaire
S07E16 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a member of the Royal Legion. Has a similar color scheme to Cloud Kicker and "Cloudy Kicks". She is a character called "Royal Legionnaire" in Gameloft's mobile game, and has a story role in the "Nightmare Night at the Museum" event, in which she is named "Homare".

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a member of the Royal Legion.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a member of the Royal Legion.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a member of the Royal Legion. Has a similar color scheme to "The Tenth Doctor / Doctor Whooves #3".

characters.name:
Skeptical Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. She is a character called "Skeptical Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S07E18 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as the pharaoh of a village and Prince Hisan's father in Somnambula's legend.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, and Father Knows Beast. Resembles Windy Whistles.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild and Between Dark and Dawn. His cutie mark is three envelopes.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild. Shares his design and eye color with "Desert Wind" and his design with "End Zone" and S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1.

characters.name:
Janitor Pony
S07E23 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Secrets and Pies as a janitor at the Wonderbolt Academy. Also appears in Yakity-Sax. His cutie mark is a broom. Voiced by Scott Underwood.

characters.name:
Peppy Friendship Student
S08E14 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, The Hearth's Warming Club, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, What Lies Beneath, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, She's All Yak, A Horse Shoe-In, Growing Up is Hard to Do (as an Earth pony), The Big Mac Question (as an Earth pony), The Ending of the End - Part 2, and Rarity's Biggest Fan as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her body design with S07E18 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a rainbow between two clouds, similarly to the G3/G3.5 counterpart of Rainbow Dash. She is a character named "Peppy Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss during the She's All Yak event. Her bio states, "When it comes to campus activities, this pony is game for anything - even improv!"

characters.name:
Seafoam Townspony
S08E14 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, The Summer Sun Setback, A Horse Shoe-In, Growing Up is Hard to Do, and The Ending of the End - Part 2 as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design with S07E22 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark appears to be an ocarina. He is a character named "Seafoam Townspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "Sometimes, when he tells ponies he likes 'long walks on the beach,' they think he's just being ironic. It really is true, though!"

characters.name:
Periwinkle Townspony
S08E21 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, The Summer Sun Setback, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with Sunshower and S09E26 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3. She is a character named "Periwinkle Townspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states "She has relatively little interest in molluscs - that's just what color she is!" Her cutie mark is two fish.

characters.name: S08E21 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, She's All Yak, A Horse Shoe-In, The Ending of the End - Part 2 (as an Earth pony), and The Last Problem (as an Earth pony) as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design with S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #3 and S06E13 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #4. His cutie mark is a slice of pizza.

characters.name: S09E06 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Common Ground competing in the Appleloosa buckball tournament. Her cutie mark is three raindrops and a leaf sprout.

characters.name: S09E06 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Common Ground competing in the Appleloosa buckball tournament. His cutie mark is a flaming diamond.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Ponyville. Her cutie mark is a flan.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Ponyville. Shares her body design with "Fiery Fricket".

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Ponyville. Shares her design with Sunshower and S08E21 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1.
